name: Eternal War: Back to life
description:
Play with your friend at one device. Take lead of your zombie horde and eat the human flesh to replicate OR Shoot em all up to get rid of these rotten worms!

Fight untill last unit dies and turn the roles!

Game made durning the Sensei Gamejam.

Press SPACE to SHOOT.

Press P to RUSH.

Credits: Michał Kaczmarek, Wojciech Mosieński, Przemysław Oszust, Piotr Stefański
